scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run dev" "wait-on tcp:3000 && electron ."
scripts.build:all: npm run bump && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --win --linux
scripts.build:mac: npm run bump && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:win: npm run bump && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run bump && npm run build && electron-builder --linux

scriptsInfo.dev: Starts the Vite dev server for web development.
scriptsInfo.build: Builds the React application using Vite (output to dist/).
scriptsInfo.bump: Increments the patch version in package.json automatically.
scriptsInfo.electron:dev: Runs the Electron app in development mode with hot-reloading.
scriptsInfo.build:all: Bumps version, builds the app, and packages for macOS (DMG), Windows (EXE), and Linux (AppImage/Deb).
scriptsInfo.build:mac: Bumps version, builds, and packages for macOS only.
scriptsInfo.build:win: Bumps version, builds, and packages for Windows only.
scriptsInfo.build:linux: Bumps version, builds, and packages for Linux only.
